messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: I previously served as a Royal Navy aircraft engineer, a firefighter and for 5 years, on the local council, investing millions of pounds into our community. I wish to serve you again...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants Australia's points-based system to control who comes to the UK. Fairer, stricter, controlled.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Work and Invest in the NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Extra £3 billion every year for the NHS funded by savings from leaving the EU, emphasizing training for doctors and nurses.
Cut foreign aid to pay less tax. Scrap HS2, scrap the new toll road and lower the 'bedroom tax'.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Spend our money in our area
keyPolicies.policyDescription: By stopping 'open door' EU migration, saving BIG on our EU membership bill and foreign aid, we can invest the savings in local services and businesses.

issues.brexitEurope: Savings from leaving the EU and controlling EU migration
issues.economy: Cut foreign aid to pay less tax. Scrap HS2 and the new toll road.
issues.health: Extra £3 billion every year for the NHS
issues.immigration: Control who comes to the UK with an Australian points-based system.

leaflet.personalStatement: I previously served as a Royal Navy aircraft engineer, a firefighter and for 5 years, on the local council, investing millions of pounds into our community. I wish to serve you again...

politicalExperience.achievements: Investing millions of pounds into the community.

images.caption: Image of Ben Walker, UK INDEPENDENCE PARTY candidate for Filton and Bradley Stoke
